text: @HillaryClinton He’s going to be in a rude awakening 20 days from June 29 when the second wave started today. Because country open up too soon the 14 day incubation period for covid-19 ends today, June 11. The new cases have already increasing the infection rate. The third wave is coming Aug 1.
